pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Grants the totem-holder Fire Resistance while the totem is active.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_of_amethyst)Totem of Amethyst$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 1 $(br)$(l)Active/Passive:$() Active, drains durability while using and on fire or in lava$(br)$(l)Tier:$() Medium$(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other active totem augments.
